name: Escaping with a Malfunctioning Jump
description:
Navigate your way to the ground floor. But be careful; there seems to be something wrong with your jump command...

Please enjoy this simple platformer prototype where jumping is out of your control! You may need to maximize the window in order to enjoy.

GMTK Game Jam 2020 entry.

Coded and directed by Devin.

Original art by Maddy.
